description: Choose whether to align the media (image, video, etc.) to the right or left of the content.

fields.description: Choose whether to include a dropdown menu of sublinks. If this is on, we remove the link from the nav item itself.

fields.name: permanent

validation.message: Shorter titles are usually better for SEO.

fields.description: This will change your page meta title in browsers. Ideal length is 50-60 characters.

validation.message: Shorter descriptions are usually better for SEO.

fields.description: This will change your page description in browsers. Ideal length is 50-160 characters.

fields.description: The thumbnail displayed on social networks (such as Facebook & LinkedIn) to preview your webpage whenever someone shares this page link. Recommended 1200 x 630px.
